wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Augustus Fawcus (10 November 1895 – 30 June 1966) was an English cricketer.  Fawcus was a right-handed batsman who bowled with his right-arm, although his bowling style is unknown.  He was born at Newcastle-upon-Tyne, Northumberland, and educated at Aldenham School and would later become a British Army and Royal Air Force officer.  He died at Halton, Buckinghamshire, on 30 June 1966.
